N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 171-3.2 - In general

State Regulations
(a) It is the
policy of the OCFS to permit facility residents to correspond with certain
persons/entities, as listed below, in a confidential manner. (b) Accordingly, procedures are to be
developed, at all facilities, to ensure the confidentiality of privileged
correspondence while maintaining the effective, safe and secure operation of
the facility. (c) Local procedures
are to be consistent with the provisions of this regulation. (d) Unless otherwise covered in this
regulation, all other resident correspondence will be covered by the provisions
of Subpart 171-2 of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9

171-3.2
